{{Refimprove|date=August 2008}} {{Primary sources|article|date=October 2008}} {{infobox shopping mall | | shopping_mall_name = SM Center Molino | image = SM Supermalls Logo.png | image_width = 200px | caption = ''"We've got it all for you!"''
''"Cavite's 3rd, Bacoor's 2nd"'' | location = {{flagicon|Philippines}} Molino Road, Brgy. Molino 4, Bacoor, Cavite | opening_date = November 18, 2005 | developer = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | manager = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | owner = [[Henry Sy|Henry Sy, Sr.]] | building_cost = | number_of_buildings = 1 | number_of_stores = | number_of_anchors = 5 | floor_area = {{convert|48710|m2|ft2|abbr=on}} | parking = | floors = 2 | website = [http://smsupermalls.com/smsupermalls/index.php?p=651&mall=19 SM Center Molino Official Website] }} '''SM Center Molino''', formerly known as '''SM Supercenter Molino''', is a shopping mall owned and operated by [[SM Prime Holdings]], the largest mall operator in the Philippines. It is the third SM mall in the province of Cavite and was opened on November 2005. '''SM Center Molino''' has 4 cinemas. Cinema 1 & 2 are equipped with Dolby Digital Surround EX and Cinema 3 & 4 are equipped Dolby. It has a land area of {{convert|4.8|ha|acre}} and a floor area of {{convert|48710|m2|ft2|abbr=on}}. It is located at Molino Road, Molino 4, Bacoor, Cavite. == Anchors == *SM Hypermarket *SM Cinemas *SM Food Court *SM Appliance Center == Junior anchors == *Ace Hardware *[[Banco De Oro]] *Watsons *[[National Bookstore]] *Toby's Sports *Astro Plus *[[Max's of Manila]] *[[Mang Inasal]] *[[Chowking]] *[[KFC]] == References == ==See also== *[[SM Prime Holdings]] *[[SM City Bacoor]] *[[SM City DasmariÃ±as]] *[[SM City Rosario]] {{S-start}} {{S-bef|before=[[SM Center Valenzuela]]}} {{s-ttl|title=22nd ''[[SM Supermalls|SM Supermall]]''|years=2005}} {{s-aft|after=[[SM City Santa Rosa]]}} {{S-end}} {{Malls in Cavite}} {{SMPH}} {{Navbox |name = SM Hypermarket Branches |title = [[SM Hypermarket|{{color|#0000A0|SM Hypermarket}}]] |titlegroup = |titlestyle = background:#00FF00; color:#0000A0 |groupstyle = background::#00FF00; color:#0000A0 |group1 = Branches:|
